titleStmt.title: A late letter from the citty of Florence, vvrittem by Signor Fabricio Pisani a counsellor of the Rota, touching these present distempers of England, vvherein hee, with some of the prime statesmen in Florence give their judgments which way the said distempers may be totally compos'd. VVith som signal remarks upon the nativity of Charls the second, &c.
titleStmt.author: Pisani, Fabricio.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
